text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria densinervia is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Cameroon.  Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Cheek, M. (2004). "Psychotria densinervia". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46162A11032923. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46162A11032923.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
